tasks.task_description: Check and remove any deployment-related config from package.json
Check and remove any deployment-related config from astro.config.mjs

description: Clean up all deployment configurations including Wrangler, Alchemy, and related files
context: Deleted wrangler.toml, .wrangler directory, alchemy.run.ts, and .alchemy directory
Removed deployment scripts (deploy, deploy:pages, destroy, alchemy:dev) and devDependencies (@astrojs/cloudflare, @cloudflare/workers-types, alchemy, wrangler) from package.json
Removed Cloudflare adapter import, output: 'server', and adapter configuration from astro.config.mjs. All deployment configurations have been cleaned up.
